ambiguities.source_text: the number of transactions containing moisturiser which also contain hand soap
ambiguities.ref:
both_count = sum(1 for items in transactions.values() 
                           if lhs_item in items and rhs_item in items)

ambiguities.source_text: it's the number of times an item is bought out of the total number of transactions
ambiguities.ref: count = sum(1 for items in transactions.values() if item in items)

ambiguities.source_text: make sure that you're not creating impossible association rules
out of the total number of transactions
